kizuna_dragon_c_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh! Why, hello there, young
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_03:
I’m sorry. I was lost in thought and didn’t notice
your approach.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_04:
I feel I must again apologize for what transpired
in the schoolyard...[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_05a: Hah... That is very magnanimous of you.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_05b:
I’m of course referring to how I rather suddenly
had to take my leave while we were still engaged\r
in conversation.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_06:
That woman who showed up is a Dragon Tamer—
and a relative of mine, I might add.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_08:
You see, I come from a very long line of Trainers
who specialize in Dragon-type Pokémon.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_09:
There was a child in our family who was expected
to stand at its head and lead it to greatness.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_10:
But the young lad, rebellious little fellow that he
was, ran away from home one day.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_11:
He made quite the show of it, too, swearing he’d
“make a living with music”![VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_12:
A lot happened since then, and...now he’s the art
teacher and Elite Four member before you![VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_13:
After I so rudely took my leave during our last
conversation, my dear relative...encouraged me\r
to give up teaching and return home at last.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_14:
I’ve been told the current leader of my family—
that is to say, my father—is in poor health.[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_15:
Oh, but I do apologize. Perhaps I am not cut out
for teaching after all... What sort of teacher\r
grumbles on and on at his own student?[VAR 0114(0012)]
kizuna_dragon_c_select_04: I don’t want you to quit teaching!
